author: schor
msg: [UIMA-2020] clarify that building the source-release.zip only happens with the -Papache-release parameter

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-4985 BootLockTest can fail with ERROR XCY03: Required property 'derby.serviceProtocol' has not been set with slow configurations
Use file created by BootLockMinion to coordinate the processes.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Fixed the 'setNames(...)' method which was not clearing the list of names before adding the new ones.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-1049. py: Allow for TServerSocket python library to bind to a specific host
This patch adds a new host argument to TServerSocket that allows it to bind to a specific host.
